text: Aur mein inn cheezon say kaisay darron jin ko tum ney shareek banaya hai halankay tum iss baat say nahi dartay kay tum ney Allah kay sath aisi cheezon ko shareek thehraya hai jin per Allah Taalaa ney koi daleel nazil nahi farmaee so inn do jamaton mein say aman ka ziyada mustahiq kaun hai agar tum khabar rakhtay ho
